    1: from datetime import datetime
    2: 
    3: from pandas import Series
    4: 
    5: 
    6: class TestSetName:
    7:     def test_set_name(self):
    8:         ser = Series([1, 2, 3])
    9:         ser2 = ser._set_name("foo")
   10:         assert ser2.name == "foo"
   11:         assert ser.name is None
   12:         assert ser is not ser2
   13: 
   14:     def test_set_name_attribute(self):
   15:         ser = Series([1, 2, 3])
   16:         ser2 = Series([1, 2, 3], name="bar")
   17:         for name in [7, 7.0, "name", datetime(2001, 1, 1), (1,), "\u05D0"]:
   18:             ser.name = name
   19:             assert ser.name == name
   20:             ser2.name = name
   21:             assert ser2.name == name
